sourcesContent:
import React from "react" export class Difficulty extends React.Component { handleChange = (event) => { this.props.changeLevel(event.target.value) }; render() { let comment = ""; if (this.props.level === "easy") comment = "Yawn. B-o-o-o-ring..."; if (this.props.level === "medium") comment = "Where is your left hand, sneaky boy?"; if (this.props.level === "hard") comment = ""; if (this.props.level === "crazy") comment = ""; if (this.props.level === "insane") comment = ""; return (
{comment}
) } }
